full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Psychological Risk Assessments**
==============================================

### Reference and Contract Details

* **Contract Reference**: cb-4914-35845562
* **Solicitation Number**: 21401-27-4374329
* **Published on Date**: April 19, 2023

### Tender Submission Information

* **Tender Submission Deadline**: May 12, 2023, at 14:00
* **Estimated Contract Start Date**: June 1, 2023
* **Estimated Contract End Date**: May 31, 2024

### Details of the ITN/RFP

The Correctional Service of Canada's (CSC) Health Services requires the services of a psychologist for providing psychological assessments to offenders located at Bath Institution and Regional Treatment Centre in the Ontario Region. The successful candidate will provide these services in collaboration with an interdisciplinary health services team, including nursing, psychology, social work, occupational therapy, and other healthcare professionals.

### Qualifications and Experience

*   Bilingualism (English and French) is an asset
*   Possession of a Master of Arts or Doctorate degree in Psychology
*   Licensure (or certification) as a psychologist in the province of Ontario
*   Significant experience in conducting assessments, formulation of risk assessments, and providing supervision
*   High level of understanding of psychological or medical conditions impacting offender behavior

### Evaluation Criteria
----------------------------------

The proposals will be evaluated on their ability to meet the CSC's Requirements regarding price, responsiveness, and technical qualifications. The lowest-priced submission will be selected as the successful bidder.

### Information Regarding Award Decision

*   Award decision will be made based on the evaluation of all proposals received
*   The government reserves the right to cancel the ITN/RFP, in whole or in part, if no suitable bid is received

### Availability of Tenders Packages and Supporting Documents
---------------------------------------------------------

*   Tender documents may be requested via email from Danielle Murdoch, Project Authority, at [Danielle.Murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Danielle.Murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca)

### Cite of Questions
------------------------

Questions regarding this ITN/RFP shall be directed to Danielle Murdoch, Project Authority, at (343) 422-4831 or via email at [Danielle.Murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Danielle.Murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca)

### Contact Information
----------------------

Project Authority: Danielle Murdoch
